title: With Profit Allowed, Some College Athletes Are Getting Creative

media:group.media:title: With Profit Allowed, Some College Athletes Are Getting Creative
media:group.media:description:
Chase Griffin isn’t the starting quarterback for UCLA. But in the first year that college athletics have allowed students to profit, he's making a bid to be the president of name, image, and likeness.

#Sports #ChaseGriffin #BloombergQuicktake

Part profile, part portfolio breakdown, Athlete Empire takes us inside the business of the world's most successful athletes.
